text: It is nearly impossible to get a table , so if you ever have the chance to go here for dinner , DO NOT pass it up .
The atmosphere is n't the greatest , but I suppose that 's how they keep the prices down .
The food is reliable and the price is moderate .
The service is a bit slow , but harkens back to my years growing up in Napoli , Italy where things are not rushed and when you sit down for dinner the table is yours all night .
Not a typical pizza joint , but good for a low key and fairly cheap nice sit down dinner .
The menu changed , portions were even smaller than before , a lentil dish was salty beyond edibility , a basmati rice dish lacked flavor .
The food was below average , the service was pathetic , there was no ambience at all .
The steak is good , the fish is good and the sushi was surprisingly great .
The service is ok but could be better .
The atmosphere is unheralded , the service impeccable , and the food magnificant .
The table service could have been a little more attentive but as someone who also works in the service industry , I understood they were busy .
What came to our table was burned beyond recognition and stringy .
I also recommend the rice dishes or the different varieties of congee ( rice porridge ) .
It 's the perfect restaurant for NY life style , it got cool design , awesome drinks and food and lot 's of good looking people eating and hanging at the pink bar ...
